====== setCacheValidation ======
^ API ^ Package ^ Class ^ phpDocumentor ^ Last reviewed ^ Doc status ^
| {{http://api.joomla.org/media/images/package.png?nolink}} [[references:joomla.framework|Joomla.Framework]] | {{http://api.joomla.org/media/images/package.png?nolink}} [[references:joomla.framework/#Cache|Cache]] | {{http://api.joomla.org/media/images/Class.png?nolink}}[[JCache|JCache]] | [[http://api.joomla.org/Joomla-Framework/Cache/JCache.html#setCacheValidation|JCache->setCacheValidation]] | Never | Public review |

Enable/disable cache validation.
===== Syntax =====
void setCacheValidation	( **$validateCache** )
| **$validateCache** | boolean | is a flag which if true enables cache validation. |

===== Examples =====
Enable cache validation:
<code php|Example>
$cache = JFactory::getCache();
$cache->setCacheValidation( true );
</code>

~~DISCUSSION~~
